title: Real Terminal Demo
description: Simple task to demonstrate real worker terminal output. Create a Python script that prints colorful messages and runs some commands.
instruction:
Create a Python script called 'hello_demo.py' that:
1. Prints a welcome message with colors
2. Shows the current time
3. Lists files in the current directory
4. Prints a success message
5. Make it visually appealing with emojis and colors
